name: Breach (itch) (SecretBasment)
description:
Run, jump, fly and shoot faster that you're enemies... Or die.

You crashed on alien planet, no one won't fly here to help you, and you're entire crew has been  killed by you're clones. Dr.NOTNICEPERSON brignt you back using time travel, in the infinite dungeon. Will you be faster than you're clones, or will you die?

If things go bad, you can always take control of you're enemies :D

Have Fun!

(Btw, if you have any ideas or crytisism of some sort, please, write them in the comment, becose i'm plnning to develop game futher in future. I laso know that player and enemies look's awfull, i didn't managde to fix them jet, and i can't draw really well in this style. I made the game in 12 hours over 2 days.)
